release.action: Added new bean for storing codes for school based on school type.
Updating dependencies.
Updating and fixing dependencies to create a new sunnan3 application.
Fixed manual update of Agresso.
Added view for accounting in workspace.
Fixed has month been sent logic.

Added the possibility to send future records to Navision for certain case codes from the 1st day of a month to the last. Now you can also filter which case codes will be sent bia an application property.
Added new block to fetch statistics for a given period.
Added method to enable manual update of agresso table.
Added possibility to set an application binding property to allow choosing both from and to dates when fetching accounting entries.
Fixing bug in NavisionBusiness, used setApplicationAttribute instead of getApplicationSettings().setProperty like I should have. Also added some minimal logging.

Adding support for Navision XML export file and Maritech Navision webservice. Set egov.external.accounting.system=NAVISIONXML in application properties to activate the xml file format and set maritech.navision.enable to true to enable the webservice. The businessbean checks if it is the last day of the month and if that month has been sent before. Other application properties to consider: maritech.nav.lastmonthsent,maritech.nav.lastmonthfailed,maritech.nav.fakecurrentdate The last one can be used to force a month to process by setting it to a date of the last day of that month (2006-11-30).
Added support for multiple accounting systems when returning entries in a comma seperated file.
Added new bean for specific school product codes.
